content.rendered:
Bridge Careers is a Tulsa employer, providing medical and business employment opportunities. As a leader in workforce solutions and Tulsa staffing, every day we provide our clients with the talent and specific employment expertise needed. Bridge Career focuses on contract-to-hire and direct hire career opportunities. However, we also provide temporary professionals on an as-needed day-to-day basis, providing you the flexibility to staff up or down to meet your business needs. Our expert recruitment and selection process will help you find the right candidate with the right skills and personality that work well with your business culture. We want to make sure we have a group of quality candidates that have been thoroughly screened. To assure that, we do not accept walk-in applicants and will recruit candidates specifically to fit your needs. Our local staffing experts know each job market inside and out and have relationships with the best professionals in the marketplace. We will take time to get to know your business and company culture. We understand the need to find highly-qualified and trained professionals. In order to have a position transition from temporary to permanent, we try to find that right “fit”. Candidates are interviewed for not only skills, but personality and the position desired. We don’t just “send them out” – we search until we find the right candidate for the position. With our customer service that exceeds the industry’s standards, we try to provide a service that is hassle and headache-free. Our two specialties include the following:
  • Medical Positions: Medical Assistant, LPN, RN, X-Ray Tech, Nurse Practitioner, Medical Front Office, Biller/Coder, Financial Counselor, among others.
  • Administrative and Business Positions: Receptionist, Inside/Outside Sales, Retail Banker, IT, Insurance, Administrative Assistant, Marketing, along with many others.
Why should you use Bridge Careers Travel Agencies?
  • Hire only proven talent
  • Reduced HR Costs
  • Maintain low turnover
  • Flexibility to ramp up and slow down team size
  • Reduce HR administration
  • Reduce time spent on recruiting
  • Enjoy a “no stress” hiring process
What is Contract-to-Hire? Contract-to-hire enables our clients to fill a full-time position after an on-the-job performance evaluation. It is an intermediate staffing solution where a candidate is employed on a temporary basis with an intention to be absorbed permanently after evaluating his/her skills and capabilities for a specific period. As an employer, you get tremendous flexibility in terms of monitoring work performance of an employee prior to making a formal offer of employment. Trinity’s contract-to-hire solutions provide our customers the option of hiring the candidate after an initial three month and two week contract. During the initial engagement, our clients have the opportunity to review the candidate’s core skill level as well as ‘on-the-job’ interpersonal and presentation skills prior to making a hiring commitment. Why use Temporary Staffing? High levels of attrition are major concerns in the employment sector. Contract (temporary) staffing is the most viable option for companies to manage these forces. You get tremendous flexibility to ramp up or slow down your team size depending upon the project requirements while Bridge Careers Travel Agencies manages the contracts. Bridge Career ensures you get the best talent in your required skill set, who also have hands on experience in their specific career fields. Bridge Career offers contract/temporary staff on an hourly bill rate for a set duration of time. This engagement makes you free from all human resource functions including payroll generation and distribution, payroll tax withholding, state and federal reporting requirements and employer related insurance administration. What is Direct Hire and why is it beneficial? Adding high level candidates to your staff can often be very difficult, but it doesn’t have to be a stressful process. Bridge Careers Travel Agencies has access to top-rated individuals who have an extensive background in very specific fields – including those hard-to-reach professionals who are not actively searching for a job. And, because we are committed to finding the right professionals for your business, the only candidates you’ll meet are those who have passed our in-depth screening process. For individuals who are passive candidates and are not actively seeking employment, we provide a direct hire option for those ”high level” candidates to recruit them to your organization. Most companies spend a majority of their recruiting resources targeting the 17% who are actively looking, while most passive candidates are open to a discussion with a recruiter. Bridge Career targets the hidden 83% of candidates that are open to new opportunities while providing you with the benefit of seeing nationwide recruiting efforts with those who are otherwise elusive from most companies.
